concept.shortdesc: Standardized data formats for API communication in the Server State ecosystem

conbody.p:
Data Formats are standardized interfaces for Data Communication via JSON within the Server State Ecosystem. They can represent things like
Table-like data (that usually gets visualized in a table)
XY-Data (that can get plotted in a graph etc.
conbody.note: Ideally, all formats should include at least one implementation of a viewer in every Frontend implementation of Server State.
conbody.p: In the generated type docs is a list of Common Data formats that we can use, allowing us to use standardized FEMs.
